DOC.brief_summary: We want to investigate if early follicular phase downregulation and androgen priming, by use of GnRH antagonist, aromatase inhibitor and hCG before COH in a short protocol, shows signs of improvement compared to standard short antagonist protocol
DOC.brief_title: Short-Term Androgen Priming Before COS Using Aromatase Inhibitor and hCG During Early-Follicular-Phase GnRH Antagonist Administration - a Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Indication and wish for IVF/ICSI treatment Womens age 2039 years (both inclusive) Regular menstrual cycle within normal range Body Mass Index: 1830 kg/m2 (both inclusive) Negative pregnancy test before treatment A maximum of 3 earlier IVF/ICSI treatments that did not result in pregnancy serious systemic disease Presence of polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) Earlier poor response with less than 4 mature follicles Earlier participation in the investigation
